content.text: Match ends, Watford 1, Chelsea 3.
Second Half ends, Watford 1, Chelsea 3.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Branislav Ivanovic.
Goal!  Watford 1, Chelsea 3. Nicolas Anelka (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Salomon Kalou.
Attempt saved. Jobi McAnuff (Watford) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by John-Joe O'Toole with a through ball.
Attempt missed. Salomon Kalou (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Branislav Ivanovic.
